contentList.content: Magic Aura

A magical aura shimmers along your body. The next time you make a spell attack roll, you have advantage. You regain [1] Health when healing, and when dealing damage with a spell, you deal an additional [2].
This creature is surrounded by a magical aura. When making spell attacks, it has advantage on attack rolls. When healing, it heals an additional +1 Health. When attacking, it deals an additional [1].
Nightshield

A protective field of shadowy energy cloaks your body, protecting you from Force damage and Magic Missile, while also granting a bonus to all saving throws. The spell ends if you are exposed to direct sunlight.
Spell Strike
You may add your Wisdom modifier to any melee or ranged attacks you make. In addition, your attacks deal an additional [1].
Fire Shield

Thin, wispy flames wreathe your body for the duration, shedding bright light, and providing you with Resistance to Fire damage. Additionally, whenever a creature within Melee range attacks you, the Shield erupts in flame, lashing out at the attacker for [1].
You can end the spell early by using an action to dismiss it.
Dismiss Fire Shield
You dismiss Fire Shield prematurely, ending the Status effect, and channeling the flame into the ground, igniting flammable surfaces and melting ice.
Frost Barrier

Tendrils of icy air wreathe your body for the duration, reflecting light, and providing you with Resistance to Cold damage. Additionally, whenever a creature within Melee range attacks you, the barrier flings shards of ice at the attacker for [1].
Dismiss Frost Barrier
You dismiss Frost Barrier prematurely, ending the Status effect, and channeling the frosty currents into the ground.
Lightning Shield

Snapping sparks surround your body for the duration, giving light, and providing you with Resistance to Lightning damage. Additionally, whenever a creature within Melee range attacks you, the shield electrifies your attacker for [1].
You can end the spell early by using an action to dismiss it.
Dismiss Lightning Shield
You dismiss Lightning Shield, ending the Status effect prematurely, forcing the electrical current into the ground beneath you.
Spelldrinker
An ancient symbol shines over this creature. Whenever a spell attack is made on this creature, it restores a 1st-level Spell Slot.
For a moment, a phantasmal image of the sign of the Atronach appears around you. For the duration of the spell, whever a spell is cast against you, restore a 1st-Level spell slot.
Hearth Heal
Healing energy surrounds you, restoring your health by [1].
Spite
Deal Damage within 3m equal to your wis modifier and Goad foes who fail a Wis save
